sys_properties.description: Enter the instance which will orchestrate all the commits. Ideally, this would be the production instance but it can also be a non-prod instance. This property will be useful in a non-production environment to ensure that the scheduled job which orchestrates all the commit do not accidentally run in an environment that is not designated as the orchestrating environment. (Ensure that all non-production environments have the same value for this specific property where this tool is installed)
sys_properties.name: x_7756_update_set.service_guru_orchestrator_instance
